title: How long is it gonna take riot to sort out there shit and start punishing people who get reported
body: 3 games in a row now i have been stuck with one guy (mortis ex), 3 games over 3 days, and every time he quits, doesnt help the team, trolls, feeds or before the game has even started is abusing players in lobby, i have reported him every game as well as one game where both teams reported him...... plz oh wise and mystical riot tell me when the hell your gonna do something about tribunal? cause im sick of losing games and losing rank because of the same people over and over again... even when they are blocked.

replies.body:
As far as I'm concerned, the tribunal is never coming back. Riot hope that their new, automated systems will suffice. Not to say that banning people is now an impossible feat, it's just automated.

Eh.
